modName: Dracos Hearthfire Homes Exterior Upgrades Windstad Lakeview Heljarchen
summary: These are upgrades for the Hearthfire Homes Windstad, Lakeview, and Heljarchen. I do plan to merge the mods into one esp once I have fixed any reported issues. I wanted too make a more lore friendly and simple upgrades to the Hearthfire homes. Just some walls, guards, basic starter ruins with a (lab, enchanter, and bed), and some little details her
descriptionHtml:
[u][b]
[color=#ffff00]Updated to 1.2 Completed Jan 27, 2015 --- Beta Release[/color]

[/b][/u][color=orange][u][b]Draco's Heathfire Homes Upgraded (Requires Hearthfire).

[youtube]B14EEBZHO44[/youtube]
[/b][/u][/color]The Mods----These Mods are upgrades for the Hearthfire Homes Windstad, Lakeview, and Heljarchen. I do plan to merge the mods into one esp once I have fixed any reported issues.Reasons for

Making mod.--- I wanted too make a more lore friendly and simple upgrades to the hearthfire home. Just some walls, guards, basic starter ruins with a (lab, enchanter, and bed), and some little details here & there. Not a city or port as we currently have these on the nexus. I have also made them compatiable with (not required) Pool and Hot Bath for Hearthfire by sa547.

Lakeview Manor Home--- A modern estate home with gardens, lights, three Falreath Guards, Founations, and, Old Cabin in the woods. 

Windstad--- A ancient nord ruin walled, with old towers, lights, and three Morthal Guards. Said to be a old fort of Isgramor.

Heljarchen Hall--- An old imperial fort with ruin towers, training dummies, Lights, and, three The pale Guards.


You now have to hire the guards and a vendor for 1500 gold. Quest should start once you have or if you already have the land. Has markers as where to go.


[color=yellow][u][b]1.2 --- Beta three Version. New 1.3 Heljarchen Hall Esp

[/b][/u][/color]Not required but recommended to use with mod.
[u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35359/?] Windstad Pool and Hot Bath for Hearthfire by sa547
[/url][/u][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28515/?] Lakeview Pool and Hot Bath for Hearthfire by sa547 with TMPhoenix
[/url][/u][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36776/?] Heljarchen Pool and Hot Bath for Hearthfire by sa547
[/url][/u][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57879/?] Windstad Mine by Skvindt
[/url][/u][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50992/?] Heljarchen Farm by Skvindt
[/url][/u][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62144/?] New Hearthfire Homes Mod


[/url][/u]Note, Alls file are in main download in Bsa format for nice clean install use NMM. 

Your Load order should be this-
Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
Hearthfire.esm
Windstad Mine.esp (Not required but recommended)
Heljarchen Farm.esp (Not required but recommended)
HF_Lakeview_Pool_and_Hotbath.esp (Not required but recommended)
HF_Windstad_Pool_and_Hot_Bath.esp (Not required but recommended)
HF_Heljarchen_Pool.esp (Not required but recommended)
Dracos Hearthfire Homes Lakeview.esp
Dracos Hearthfire Homes Windstad.esp
Dracos Hearthfire Homes Heljarchen.esp

Patches--- Required for the patch download this first.
[u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36960/?] Lakeview Manor Avant Garden for Hearthfire by sa547 [/url] Also use in place of HF_Lakeview_Pool_and_Hotbath.esp

[/u][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59997/?] Hearthfire Cellars Extended Compatible as well[/url]

Note the esp can be anywhere as long as you have no conflicting mods in the same area then it should go above them.

As, always please report bugs and anything missing in the bsa so I can fix.

[color=yellow][u][b]Wet and Cold Friendly as you can see in Pictures!!!

[/b][/u][/color][color=yellow][u][b]Well tested With over 200 mods installed!!![/b][/u][/color] 

[color=yellow][u][b]Please endorse IF you like.[/b][/u][/color] 

(As I have all the loose file for the creation kit I can't test bsa so let me know if you get Yellow ! mark or the quest doesn't work).I have used and planned this for a long time. So I hope you can see the detail and planning in it. 

[color=yellow][u][b]---Plans to do in Future Updates---
[/b][/u][/color]Fix any errors reported.
Open to suggestions.


[color=yellow][u][b]---Update Info.---
[/b][/u][/color]See Changes Tab.

[color=yellow][u][b]----Known Conflicts.
[/b][/u][/color]OwenHoliday-HearthFire-WindstadManor_Fortify.esp (Changes the Terran at windstad)


[color=yellow][u][b]----MODS you will see in the pictures but are not in this mod.  Are all on the nexus for the most part. Hundreds textures changes to many to list. ENB used is a edited version of True Vision ENB just made nights brighter----[/b][/u][/color] 
[color=yellow][u][b]

My other mods
[/b][/u][/color][color=yellow][u][b]Draco1122[/b][/u][/color][u]

files.name: Dracos Heathfire Homes Lakeview 1.2
files.changelogHtml:
Made it so you need to hire guards for 1500 gold at each home. Quest starts when you get home and move to new cell.
Edited Heljarchen Hall walls, made gate bigger, and added pull chains.
